name: Worm Impending Death
description:
Worm Impending Death is game made in only  3 days for the Wowie Jam 3.0,

this game is about a worm that want to kill itself, why ? because failure is progress.

You have to die by losing all your tails by eating salt and avoid fruits.

It is recommended to download the game and play it on PC. 

Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/Rovln

YouTube : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3mPhtbZxjzrarE3sepUUYA

Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/rovln_en/
